name: Baby Sitting Service
shortDescription: Trusted and caring babysitters for your child at home.
description: Our Baby Sitting Service provides trained and verified caregivers to take care of your child in a safe and loving environment. Services include feeding, hygiene, playtime, and basic supervision.

name: Elderly Care Service
shortDescription: Professional home care services for elderly family members.
description: Our Elderly Care Service ensures comfort, safety, and companionship for senior citizens. Caregivers assist with daily activities, medication reminders, and emotional support.

name: Sick People Care Service
shortDescription: Home care support for sick or recovering patients.
description: Our Sick People Care Service provides compassionate care for patients at home. Caregivers assist with daily needs, basic medical support, and ensure proper rest and recovery.
